pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, August 13, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Toronto, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Mayor of Toronto John Tory.

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister and Mayor of Toronto John Tory will hold a joint media availability. 

Members' Lounge
Toronto City Hall Council Chamber
Toronto City Hall
100 Queen Street West

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:15 a.m.
